sect1.title: Example Cisco ASA Deployment
sect1.para: This Getting Started Guide is based on configuring a Cisco ASA 5505 to match the network deployment shown in the diagram below.

The goal of the Getting Started Guide is to help users become familiar with the basic process of configuring a Cisco ASA or PIX firewall using Firewall Builder, so there are many advanced features that won't be covered here. The Users Guide has a complete listing of all Firewall Builder features.
